name: Items To Be Requested Main Store
query:
SELECT
    tabBin.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:120",
    `tabItem Reorder`.warehouse_reorder_qty ,
     tabBin.stock_uom,
    tabBin.warehouse as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:120",
    'RequiredDate' = CURDATE() AS "Date:data/Account:150",
    tabBin.actual_qty as "Actual:Float:90",
    tabBin.indented_qty as "Requested:Float:90",
    tabBin.ordered_qty as "Ordered:Float:90",
    `tabItem Reorder`.warehouse_reorder_level 
   
FROM
    tabBin, tabItem, `tabItem Reorder`
WHERE
      tabBin.item_code = tabItem.item_code
      and  tabBin.item_code = `tabItem Reorder`.parent
     
      and  tabBin.warehouse = `tabItem Reorder`.warehouse
      and `tabItem Reorder`.warehouse = "Main Drug Store - SSSH"
      and  tabBin.warehouse = "Main Drug Store - SSSH"
      and  `tabItem Reorder`.warehouse_reorder_level  > tabBin.actual_qty 
ORDER BY
    tabBin.actual_qty ASC
report_name: Items To Be Requested Main Store
